ComicInfo.Summary:
Devon's newest release is full color and features a story of Meriem on the move - no Marshville, no supporting characters. Just Cavewoman and her surroundings and the creatures that live within. This stunning and violent story will be presented with no words and will be told in a mix of full page splashes and two panel pages. This will be the prologue issue to Devon's upcoming full-color Cavewoman mini-series!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Devon Massey | 1 | B | Cover B | Devon Massey | Missing | C | Cover C Nude Cover, Limited to 400 w/CoA | Devon Massey | Missing | D | Cover D, Limited to 600 w/CoA | Budd Root | Missing | E | Cover E Nude Cover, Limited to 600 w/CoA | Budd Root | Missing | F | Cover F, Limited to 850 w/CoA | Art Adams (a) & Liezl Buenaventura (c) | 2 |
